thread.title: Key and Peele donated to Von Miller's charity after NFL fined him for pelvic thrusts

title: Key and Peele donated to Von Miller's charity after NFL fined him for pelvic thrusts
text:
Key and Peele donated to Von Miller‚Äôs charity after NFL fined him for pelvic thrusts Resize Text By Jake Russell October 16 at 9:48 PM Follow @_JakeRussell Von Miller‚Äôs thrusts are costly but his comedic friends have his back. (Jack Dempsey/Associated Press) 
The Denver Broncos‚Äô Von Miller has made a habit this season of paying tribute to a skit from the ‚ÄúKey and Peele‚Äù show with celebratory pelvic thrusts , an homage to the late legendary wrestler ‚ÄúRavishing‚Äù Rick Rude . The NFL doesn‚Äôt like that habit, however, and fined Miller $11,567 for ‚Äúunsportsmanlike conduct‚Äù after the celebratory ‚Äúdance‚Äù followed a sack of Lions quarterback Matthew Stafford during the Broncos‚Äô game in Detroit in Week 3. 
[ Oct. 4: Von Miller was about to do his sack dance, then remembered that he‚Äôs been fined for it ] 
Keegan-Michael Key and Jordan Peele, the show‚Äôs stars, decided to turn the situation into a good deed this week and donated the amount of the fine to Miller‚Äôs charity, ‚ÄúVon‚Äôs Vision,‚Äù which provides Denver-area children with eye care and eyewear. Preciate u @KeeganMKey & @JordanPeele for showing love to #vonsvision Thrust fine = 450+ pairs of glasses for kids!! pic.twitter.com/v337cJdgjY 
‚Äî Von Miller (@Millerlite40) October 16, 2015 Thank you Von! We felt bad that you got fined without even going for that third pump!üëì https://t.co/XSo0Vw5KYf 
‚Äî Jordan Peele (@JordanPeele) October 16, 2015 Keegan and I gave Von Miller's awesome charity #Vonsvision the amount of his recent fine. You should too. Get kids glasses! #threepumprule 
‚Äî Jordan Peele (@JordanPeele) October 16, 2015 
The No Fun League hasn‚Äôt announced any fines for the comedic duo as of yet. sports Success! Check your inbox for details. You might also like: Please enter a valid email address Sign Up
